DOC.brief_title: Clinical Comparison Two Resin Composites Diastema Closure Reshaping Four Years
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate clinical performance nano-hybrid resin composite system use anterior diastema closure tooth reshape 4 year service use FDI Criteria . The study protocol approve Ethical Committee Hacettepe University , Ankara , Turkey Ethical Committee Ministry Health ( protocol HEK KA-14004 ) . A total 23 patient ( 6 male , 17 female , mean age : 31.27 ) maxillary anterior midline multi-diastema problem receive 76 direct composite resin restoration . The teeth restore first clean pumice-water slurry use rubber cup . The appropriate shade restorative material select use standard VITAPAN® Classic shade guide initial intraoral photograph take . Teeth isolate use cotton roll Mylar strip place help wedge interproximally achieve smooth overhang free restoration outline cervical area form final restoration . The surface restore etch use 35 % phosphoric orthophosphoric acid 30 accord restorative system use . The etched surface rinse dry . Nano-hybrid resin composite system use patient randomly select . Thirty seven teeth 10 patient restore Filtek-Z550 ( 3M/ESPE , St. Paul , MN , USA ) combination Adper™ Single Bond 2 ( 3M/ESPE , St. Paul , MN , USA ) etch & rinse adhesive ; whereas 39 teeth 13 patient restore Charisma-Diamond ( Heraeus Kulzer , GmbH , Germany ) combination Gluma2 Bond ( Heraeus Kulzer , GmbH , Germany ) etch & rinse adhesive two operator . Materials use accord manufacturer ' instruction . Two calibrated observer blind objective study perform evaluation . For maximum validity , observer calibrate use web-based training calibration tool www.e-calib.info recommend FDI . Both observer evaluate esthetic , functional biological property restoration independently baseline , 1-2-3 4 year use FDI Criteria establish score-range 1-5 ( 1-Clinically excellent/very good , 2-Clinically good , 3-Clinically sufficient/satisfactory , 4-Clinically unsatisfactory 5-Clinically poor ) . After data collection , case discrepancy score , restoration evaluate , consensus reach accepted final score . Statistical analysis perform SPSS 15.0 software . To compare performance restorative material accord FDI criterion study period , Fisher 's Chi-Square test use . The Cochran 's Q test use compare 1-2-3 4-year score material baseline score evaluate change dependent group time . Survival curve obtain use Kaplan-Meier method . p value le 0.05 consider statistically significant test .
DOC.criteria: subject require least 18 year old , able read sign inform consent document , physically psychologically able tolerate conventional restorative procedure , active periodontal pulpal disease , teeth good restoration , willing return followup examination outline investigator . uncontrolled parafunction ; insufficient oral hygiene lead caries lesion twice yearly previous 2 year ; pregnant nursing ; periodontal gingival disease .
